etl.query:
SELECT a.uuid AS uuid_key, CASE WHEN aNode.uuid IS NULL THEN a.uuid ELSE aNode.uuid END AS endorsing_node_key, ar.has_accepted AS endorsement_approved, a.ws_password AS password, a.name AS title, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(a.description))<10 THEN null ELSE a.description END AS description, CASE WHEN a.language IS NULL THEN 'en' WHEN char_length(trim(a.language))<2 THEN 'en' ELSE a.language END AS language, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(a.email))<5 THEN null ELSE a.email END AS email, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(a.phone))<5 THEN null ELSE a.phone END AS phone, a.homepage AS homepage, a.logoURL as logo_url, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(a.address))<1 THEN null ELSE a.address END AS address, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(a.city))<1 THEN null ELSE a.city END AS city, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(a.iso_country_code))<2 THEN null ELSE a.iso_country_code END AS country, a.created, a.modified, a.deleted, 'ADMIN' AS created_by, 'ADMIN' AS modified_by FROM agent a JOIN agent_relation ar ON a.id=ar.to_agent_id JOIN agent aNode ON aNode.id=ar.from_agent_id WHERE a.type=14010 AND ar.deleted IS NULL
INSERT INTO organization(key,endorsing_node_key,endorsement_approved,password, title,description,language,email,phone,homepage,logo_url,address,city,country, created,modified,deleted,created_by,modified_by) VALUES(?uuid_key::uuid,?endorsing_node_key::uuid,?endorsement_approved::boolean,?password, ?title,?description,?language,?email,?phone,?homepage,?logo_url,?address,?city,?country, ?created,?modified,?deleted,?created_by,?modified_by);
